page.title: 20Database by..............
page.content:
This database has been compiled by the children of Class 2J,Perranporth School with the help of Mr.T.Bowyer, class teacher.This work would not have been possible but for the help and guidance of Miss M.Perriman,county peripatetic advisory teacher.
CHILDREN: Joanna Walker Merlin Bridges Gary Nicholls Sarah Allsopp David Lenz Daniel Sutton Tanya Higgins Samantha Harris Clare Beattie Sherry Dodson Jamie Helm Nicola Stephens Matthew Green Jason Smith Molcolm Wills Alan Tilley James Potter Anna Stephens Vicki Dyke Charlotte Goodey
JUNE/JULY 1985
